metadata.description:
No one can attack the Aztec treasure without consequences...

Conquistador Hernán Cortés and his army are under the protection of Emperor Moctezuma who considers them gods equals. But Cortés is greedy and soon he sets up a mission to steal Moctezuma's priceless treasure. Mercenary Hernando Royo leads the crew. They will soon face the Legendary Defenders of the Aztec Treasure and will have to flee through the terrifying Jungle to survive. Moctezuma High Priest unleashes the most ruthless Creatures on them...
metadata.name: Conquistador
